description:
Traited class [tvb.simulator.models.wong_wang_exc_inh.DecoBalancedExcInh]

[Deco_2021]Deco, Gustavo, Morten L. Kringelbach, Aurina Arnatkeviciute,

Stuart Oldham, Kristina Sabaroedin, Nigel C. Rogasch, Kevin M. Aquino, and Alex Fornito. "Dynamical consequences of regional heterogeneity in the brain’s transcriptional landscape." Science Advances 7, no. 29 (2021): eabf4752.

Equations extend the [DPA_2013] with effective gain parameter M_i to

\begin{align*} x_{ek} &= w_p\,J_N \, S_{ek} - J_iS_{ik} + W_eI_o + GJ_N \mathbf\Gamma(S_{ek}, S_{ej}, u_{kj}) \\ H(x_{ek}) &= \dfrac{M_i(a_ex_{ek}- b_e)}{1 - \exp(-d_e M_i(a_ex_{ek} -b_e))} \\ \dot{S}_{ek} &= -\dfrac{S_{ek}}{\tau_e} + (1 - S_{ek}) \, {\gamma}H(x_{ek}) \\ \end{align*}
\begin{align*} x_{ik} &= J_N \, S_{ek} - S_{ik} + W_iI_o + {\lambda}GJ_N \mathbf\Gamma(S_{ik}, S_{ej}, u_{kj}) \\ H(x_{ik}) &= \dfrac{M_i(a_ix_{ik} - b_i)}{1 - \exp(-d_i M_i(a_ix_{ik} -b_i))} \\ \dot{S}_{ik} &= -\dfrac{S_{ik}}{\tau_i} + \gamma_iH(x_{ik}) \ \end{align*}

Attributes declared

M_i : tvb.simulator.models.wong_wang_exc_inh.DecoBalancedExcInh.M_i = NArray(label='\(ratio\)', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Effective gain within a region.

[n/C]. Excitatory population input gain parameter, chosen to fit numerical solutions.
